channel.title: CVE Feed for todiadiatmo -- Easy Custom Auto Excerpt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for todiadiatmo -- Easy Custom Auto Excerpt

item.title: CVE-2024-3312|2024-05-02T16:52:23.219Z -- todiadiatmo -- easy%20custom%20auto%20excerpt
item.description: The Easy Custom Auto Excerpt plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.12. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to obtain excerpts of password-protected posts.
